programme.desc: Reba tries to refrain from making fun of Barbra Jean during Jake's birthday party, but her plan backfires.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Shari's Second Act
programme.desc: Shari just moved back to D.C. after a breakup and hopes to start painting again. Inspiration hits when she meets Evan, a repairman who winds up actually being a gallery owner.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Josh's Third Serving
programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Kiki's Fourth Ingredient
programme.desc: Kiki is overjoyed and then overwhelmed when she agrees to cater a big wedding. She turns to Clay for support. Together, Kiki and Clay prove that the best ingredient is love.

programme.title: Sweet Autumn
programme.desc: Aunt Dee splits her candy shop between her niece Maggie and maple farmer Dex. Following letters Dee left, the two uncover the reason for her decision during the Sweet Autumn festival.

programme.desc: Goldy agrees to cater an elaborate wedding, but a dead groom and a missing bridezilla brings her together with Tom again.

programme.desc: Frasier is caught in a compromising position with a stripper (Rachel York) while trying to win back his ex (Gigi Rice).

programme.desc: Sam seeks professional help for his sex addiction; Rebecca finds herself attracted to the beer-tap repairman.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca's romance with Don (Tom Berenger) blossoms; Woody, Cliff and Norm experience major changes in their lives.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba learns she will be spending Christmas Eve alone; Cheyenne and Van try to start a holiday tradition, but their plan backfires.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Everyone takes turns in front of the camera to create a video family album for Cheyenne's baby, Elizabeth.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba tries to sell her engagement ring online, Brock bids in hope of getting the ring back; Van decides it is time to buy Cheyenne a ring.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean are furious when Brock reveals he had a vasectomy; Cheyenne and Van move out of the house in protest when Reba lays down new rules following a pregnancy scare.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy consults medical experts about her chronic fatigue, which raises concern in Rose and Sophia.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Harry Weston recommends a specialist who diagnoses Dorothy's illness.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's unmarried daughter announces her desire to have a baby.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose has to go and get a job when she loses her late husband's pension, where she is confronted for the first time by ageism.

programme.title: Love's Portrait
programme.desc: Museum curator Lily finds a painting that's identical to her and searches for the artist in Ireland. While there, a charming man joins her on her quest and helps her rediscover love.

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: Since Elizabeth, who is a down-to-earth high school teacher, and Donovan, a reserved New York businessman, are so different, their trip to the altar is lively and unpredictable.

programme.title: Romance in the Air
programme.desc: A woman gets a chance at happiness when she returns home and reunites with a childhood friend.

programme.title: Frozen in Love
programme.desc: When struggling bookstore owner Mary and Adam, a bad boy of professional hockey, are teamed together to help facilitate an image makeover for the other, they soon realize that opposites attract, and they find themselves unexpectedly frozen in love.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie wonders what life would be like if she had married an ex who became famous. When she finds herself magically transported into the past, Angie has the chance to relive that Christmas and learn what (and who) is truly important to her.

programme.title: A Biltmore Christmas
programme.desc: A magical hourglass sends modern-day screenwriter Lucy Hardgrove to the set of the 1947 holiday movie classic "His Merry Wife!" However, before she can return to the present, Lucy must make things right or threaten to alter the future forever.
